ovdesc.p: This application records common characteristics of Loan Product Types. The basic conditions to be eligible for a particular loan is defined here.

desc.p: Specifies the minimum Loan to Value ratio for mortgage loan. The ratio is calculated as Loan Amount/Property Value*100. No input field.
A certain LTV percentage beyond which the process has to go for the second approval can be defined here. Validation rules:Max 5 digits allowed
Upper LTV limit for the particular product can be mentioned here. Validation rules:Max 5 digits allowed
Specifies the type of product, which can be listed as drop down. (Ex: PERSONAL.LOAN, ,MORTGAGE, VEHICLE.LOAN)
Specifies the minimum GDS value required for a loan product. The description on GDS is given in EB.MORTGAGE.FORM1.
Denotes the valuation fee to be colleced for the property valuation, should be in amount format Validation rules:Max 10 digits allowed
Specifies the maximum permissible amount for the loan. Loan amount cannot be more than the maximum amount specified. Validation rules:Max 10 digits allowed
Defines the documents to be printed for Final approval
Specifies the minimum permissible term for the loan. Loan term cannot be lesser than the minimum term specified. Validation rules:Max 5 digits allowed
Specifies the minimum permissible amount for the loan. Loan amount cannot be less than the minimum amount specified. Validation rules:Max 10 digits allowed
Specifies the minimum TDS value required for a loan product. The description on TDS is given in EB.MORTGAGE.FORM1.
Specifies the maximum permissible term for the loan. Loan term cannot be more than the maximum term specified. Validation rules:Max 5 digits allowed
Unique reference for each type of product in free format text.
Defines the documents to be printed for inprinciple approval
Denotes the arrangement fee for a loan disbursal, should be in amount format Validation rules:Max 10 digits allowed
